channel.title: Npc error

item.title: Npc error
item.dc:creator: @jaloko jaloko
item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

.\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:451: class, interface, or enum expected public int npcType = 9; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:456: class, interface, or enum expected public String name = "Gaurd"; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:461: class, interface, or enum expected public int respawnDelay = 60; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:466: class, interface, or enum expected public int attackEmote = 412; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:470: class, interface, or enum expected public int defendEmote = 404; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:471: class, interface, or enum expected public int deathEmote = 837; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:476: class, interface, or enum expected public int attackDelay = 5; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:481: class, interface, or enum expected public int combatLevel = 23; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:486: class, interface, or enum expected public int maxHP = 60; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:491: class, interface, or enum expected public int maxHit = Misc.random(3); ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:496: class, interface, or enum expected public int atkType = 0; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:501: class, interface, or enum expected public int weakness = 2; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:506: class, interface, or enum expected public int currentHP = 60; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:511: class, interface, or enum expected public int direction = -1; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:516: class, interface, or enum expected public int heightLevel = 0; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:521: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean faceToUpdateReq = false; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:522: class, interface, or enum expected public int faceToRequest = -1; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:527: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean isDead = false; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:532: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean deadEmoteDone = true; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:537: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean hiddenNPC = false; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:542: class, interface, or enum expected public int absX = 0, absY = 0; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:547: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean needsRespawn = true; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:552: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean randomWalk = true; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:557: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean updateReq = false; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:562: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean speakTextUpdateReq = false; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:563: class, interface, or enum expected public String speakText = "Im a gaurd of pikachu's land!"; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:568: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean hit1UpdateReq = false; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:569: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean hit2UpdateReq = false; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:570: class, interface, or enum expected public int hitDiff1 = 0; ^ .\Bulby\npcs\NPC.java:571: class, interface, or enum expected public int posionHit1 = 0;

what am i doing wrong?

Read full topic
